Precondition:
open the browser
enter the url
signup with user credentials
Test Condition:
Verify user is able to Buy a item
 using Cash on Delivery.
Test Case Steps:
1. Enter the url.
2. Select the product.
3.Click on Buy Now button.
4. Select the address.
5. Click on Deliver To This Address.
6. Select the Payment method.
7. Click on COD.
8. Click on Continue.
9. Click on Place Order.
Expected Result: user should able to Buy a item using Cash on Delivery.

Precondition:
open the browser
enter the url
signup with user credentials
Test Condition:
Verify user is able to Select the Pay Cash on delivery by clicking on Cash on Delivery drop down
 button.
Test Case Steps:
1. Enter the url.
2. Select the product.
3.Click on Buy Now button.
4. Select the address.
5. Click on Deliver To This Address.
6. Select the Payment method.
7. Click on COD.
8. Click on Pay cash on delivery.
9. Click on Continue.
10. Click on Place Order.
Expected Result:
user should able to Select the Pay Cash on delivery by clicking on Cash on Delivery drop down
 button.

Test Condition:
Verify user is able to Buy a item
 using Reselling the order.
Test Case Steps:
1. Enter the url.
2. Search for the item.
3. Click on Buy Now. 
4. Select the address.
5. Click on Delivery To This Address.
6. Select the Payment method.
7. Click on COD.
8. Click on Yes.
9. Enter the amount in your Margin text Field.
10. Click on Continue.
11. Click on Place Order.
Expected Result: user should able to Buy a item using Reselling the order.
